attributes.comment:
I have just learned of the proposed fee increases for adoptive parents and am appalled.
Besides making us go through the process a second time since some international
adoptions are taking longer than the 18 month limit, the fees will be higher. In fact a
total increase of almost $1000.00 by the time we have our child home. As adoptive
parents, we are already searching for ways to finance growing our family, but for our
own government to smack us with these absorbient fees is absurd. I request you to
please review your increases in light that as adoptive parents, we have to file twice.
Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Carol Mueller
